categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A battle at Uviuy Exen was a engagement during the New Republic liberation campaign after the Battle of Endor. Buoyed by the recent successes against Moff Utoxx Prentioch and the capture of Reytha and Denon, the New Republic sent a fleet commanded by Admiral Gial Ackbar from Brentaal IV, which had been liberated two years earlier, along the Hydian Way in order to cut off the New Territories from the Core Worlds.
